About Me

As an open-source enthusiast, I try to work on side projects that I feel will help other developers or create things that I feel could improve the daily lives of people through free software. Feel free to check out my various projects or my blog posts on Medium. I'm always learning and working on something! Currently, I work as a back-end developer at SapientNitro in Boston, MA.

Radicchio

Radicchio is an open-source, server-side timer library developed in JavaScript for the NodeJS runtime. The library utilizes Redis to keep track of TTL and was published as a package on npm.

  • Client:
  • Date: Dec. 2015
  • Category: Side Project
  • Project Link: Radicchio
  • Github Link(s): Source Code

Travelers EDGE

Travelers EDGE was a static website created for The Travelers Companies, Inc. for the 10th anniversary of the Travelers EDGE program. Developed with JavaScript and the HandlebarsJS templating language, my responsibilities included building a DevOps solution using Jenkins and AWS for automatic code deployment as well as assisting with the front-end development.

  • Client: The Travelers Companies, Inc.
  • Date: Dec. 2016 - Jan. 2017
  • Category: Work Project
  • Project Link: Travelers EDGE
  • Github Link(s):

Bloxeo

Bloxeo is an open-source, brainstorming and team-collaboration web application. It utilizes a JSON API back-end written using the ExpressJS MVC framework, a MongoDB NoSQL database and a ReactJS front-end. My main responsibilities for the project included server tasks ranging from unit testing to writing services and data modeling, as well as some work on the front-end.

  • Client: MAGIC Spell Studios at RIT
  • Date: Sept. 2015 - Dec. 2016
  • Category: School Project
  • Project Link: Bloxeo
  • Github Link(s): Bloxeo Server | Bloxeo Client

MealHero

MealHero is an open-source, meal-planning application. It utilizes a JSON API back-end written in Elixir using the Phoenix framework, a PostgreSQL database and a ReactJS front-end. This is an ongoing passion project of mine and is constantly being worked on!

  • Client:
  • Date: Feb. 2017 - Present
  • Category: Side Project
  • Project Link: MealHero
  • Github Link(s): MealHero Server | MealHero Client
